about.title: About Us
about.description: We are OnService, pioneers at the intersection of AI, aviation, and customer service. Our mission: to transform the experience of passengers and companies with cutting-edge technology.

panels.title: Mission
panels.text: Optimize critical processes and enhance customer service in the global airline industry.
panels.detail: We focus on operational efficiency, reducing response times, and personalizing service, using state-of-the-art AI to solve the most complex challenges in the airline sector.

panels.title: Vision
panels.text: Make the interaction between airlines and passengers smoother, more personalized, and more effective than ever.
panels.detail: We aspire to lead the digital transformation in the industry, integrating intelligent solutions that anticipate passenger needs and improve the travel experience from start to finish.

panels.title: Values
panels.text: Innovation, empathy, excellence, and commitment to digital transformation.
panels.detail: We believe in collaboration, transparency, and continuous improvement, driving innovation with a strong ethical and human commitment.

usecases.title: Transform your customer service
usecases.description: Discover how leading airlines are revolutionizing their customer service with AI, reducing costs by up to 70% while improving passenger satisfaction.

cases.title: 24/7 Intelligent Support
cases.desc: AI agents that handle complex queries about flights, baggage, reservations, and check-in, providing instant and accurate responses at any time.

cases.title: Automated Incident Management
cases.desc: Intelligent system that guides passengers in reporting incidents and claims, automatically escalating to human agents only when necessary.

cases.title: Internal Operational Support
cases.desc: Internal virtual assistant providing instant access to operational FAQs, regulations, and procedures for crews and ground staff.

cases.title: Automated Post-Booking Sales
cases.desc: AI agents that offer upgrades, additional services, and manage post-booking changes, maximizing ARPU and improving customer experience.
